episode: I had worked, saved and planned for a couple of years to be able to afford to pay for my family to go to a week long vacation to Disneyworld and the day finally arrived. I and everyone else were so excited for this trip.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I had worked my butt off and saved as much money as possible for a Disneyworld trip for my family of 4.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a dream vacation, what happened?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I planned this trip years in advanced, booked the hotel, flight, and a weeks worth of activities for my kids and wife there.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a lot of planning, did something go wrong?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: No everything went right, this was a very exciting trip that everyone was looking forward to and I couldn't have been more hyped up for it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's amazing, it sounds like a really special experience for your family!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was, we arrived on a Sunday and planned to stay until the following Sunday. The trip was smooth and we arrived there in our hotel room in no time.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Sounds like a perfect start to the vacation!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Everyone, especially the kids, loved the hotel, from the special greetings from familiar theme park faces, to the complimentary fruit basket and the amazing view of the water park outside.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like a fantastic welcome, the kids must have been thrilled!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes they were, I was so happy that everyone else was grinning, smiling and laughing throughout the experience.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you got to see your family so happy!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: We filled our week with the parks different rides and sights. Everyday we changed it up and since they have around 6 different theme parks, we got to experience so many different thrills.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds like an adrenaline rush, did you have a favorite ride or park?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The food was great as well, we booked a private themed meal with the kids favorite characters, donald duck and goofy, and they loved that.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: How cool is that, I'm sure the kids were starstruck!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The parks were all amazing, everyone was particularly excited for the new marvel area, and the spiderman ride was exciting to participate in.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds awesome, the Marvel area must have been a highlight!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It was a highlight, and the entire trip went perfectly as possible. Everyone was excited to be there and I hope one day we can all go back one day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's great that you have such wonderful memories, I'm sure you'll get to go back someday!
